message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase my product for $13,000. I believe this product would be highly beneficial to you, and this price reflects its value.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I can't let this go for less than $11,500. It's a very fair price considering the value it brings.
I understand your position, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. Would you be willing to meet me at $11,000? I'm willing to compromise, but I really need to stay within my budget.
